actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of Elementary and Secondary Education for special programs transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority for the Office of Elementary and Secondary Education for special programs (R87-27).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of Elementary and Secondary Education for special programs transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
